content: I cant seem to find the build commands documented. I need to build 1 resource. I have the build loaded, and successfully run for the whole shebang.
There's no way to build a single resource. The build will try to be smart and, if it thinks it can, will only build what you've last changed. However, when you build, everything builds.
You 'build' resources with the spreadsheet authoring which is documented on the wiki. The ig publisher is lighter weight option for logical models and profiles.
Thanks - I think I get it now.
